banned_words.limit_reached:
You've reached the limit of {limit} banned words for this server.
Use `/bannedwords remove` or `/bannedwords clear` to make space.

add.success: The word '{word}' has been added to the banned words list.

remove.success: The word '{word}' has been removed from the banned words list.

clear.empty: No banned words found to clear.
clear.success: All banned words have been cleared.

actions.none: No actions are currently set for banned words.

enforcement.embed_description: {mention}, your message was removed because it contained a banned word.
